nodes.text: Doran'enoks were carnivorous, winged creatures that hunted in packs. They were captured by the Sith Empire to become Shock Troopers. Doran'enoks were hunted for food, and almost went extinct during the Great Sith War, and seemingly vanished from Arda I.
During a cave-in, Doran'Enoks flooded into the base and began attacking Rebels on sight.
